q: Robert King , who produces the show with his wife Michelle King , said he wanted Donald Rumsfeld to appear as a witness in a lawsuit, testifying about why aggressive interrogation techniques like water-boarding are sometimes needed during wartime. It's an episode about moral relativism about what is considered torture and what is not, Robert King said. But Keith Urbahn , who works for the former defense secretary, said the idea rules Donald Rumsfeld out.`` This area is so fraught with legal ramifications,'' Keith Urbahn said.``

Andy Coulson confirmed his resignation in a statement on Friday, saying that the continued coverage of events during his time as the editor of` News of the World' had made it difficult for him to give the 110 per cent needed in this role .''
